SELECT ai.id, ai.address, ai.name, ai.phone, ai.default_address AS defaultDddress, ai.create_date AS createDate, ui.user_name AS userName FROM address_info ai LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ai.user_id = ui.id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addressInfo.name},'%')
AND ai.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addressInfo.address},'%')
AND ai.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addressInfo.phone},'%')
ORDER BY ai.create_date DESC
